name: sfpwowerscript-tagartifact-task
friendlyName: Tag the package in version control
description: Use this utility task to  tag the version number of a package in Version Control , This task is part of SFPowerscripts
author: azlam.abdulsalam
instanceNameFormat: Tag the package in version control

inputs.name: version_control_provider
inputs.label: Select the version control provider
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select a version control provider from the dropdown

inputs.name: gitHub_connection
inputs.label: GitHub Connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the service connection name for your GitHub connection. Please note this service connection have permissions to write to the correspinding repostiory. Learn more about service connections [here](https://aka.ms/AA3am5s).

inputs.name: artifact
inputs.label: Name of the source artifact that needs to be checked out
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the artifact that is generated from the build pipeline  for a source format deployment, Please note this is not a generic utility and will only work for artifacts created by SFPowerkit

inputs.name: username
inputs.label: Username
inputs.helpMarkDown: Username for the Version Control Provider

inputs.name: password
inputs.label: Password
inputs.helpMarkDown: App Password/PAT for the Version Control Provider

inputs.name: isTelemetryEnabled
inputs.label: Send Anonymous Usage Telemetry
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enabling this will help us to collect information on the tasks and improve services. All information collected is anonymised, please check code repository to understand what data is collected

OutputVariables.name: sfpowerscripts_checked_out_path
OutputVariables.description: The path to the directory where the source code is checked out
